name.description: Unique identifier representing a specific algorithm

algorithmImage.description: image name as in the docker registry

applyCpuLimits.description: whether to apply cpu limits to the algorithm

workerCustomResources.description: Custom resource limits and requests for the algorithm worker - overrides defaults for THIS algorithm.

reservedMemory.description: Reserved memory for HKube's operations such as in-memory cache, higher value means faster data retrieval and less algorithm memory, lower value means slower data retrieval and more algorithm memory

devMode.description: runs algorithm with mounted sources to allow rapid development cycles

opengl.description: should algorithm support XGL context creation (mount X socket)

mounts.description: a list of volumes to mount into the algorithm

pvcName.description: name of an existing kubernetes pvc (persistent volume claim)

path.description: the mount path in the algorithm container

volumeType.description: Special volume types such as emptyDir

url.description: a url for the git repository

branchName.description: the branch name you wish to create a build from

tag.description: a specific tag which will trigger the build

token.description: a token which allows hkube's build system to access private repositories more information https://help.github.com/en/articles/creating-a-personal-access-token-for-the-command-line

dependencyInstallCmd.description:
Command to run to install algorithm dependencies. CWD is the algorithm root folder
Defaults to language specific defaults.
e.g. For python: pip install -r requirements.txt

baseImage.description: Custom docker image to be used as base to the newly built algorithm image

minHotWorkers.description: how many live algorithm instances will always run

maxWorkers.description: Maximum number of workers for this algorithm. 0 marks no limit

quotaGuarantee.description: The amount of algorithms required to be scheduled first in a case of cluster pressure

algorithmEnv.description: key value environment variables for algorithm

workerEnv.description: key value environment variables for worker

queue.description: Name of the KAI queue to assign the algorithm to

nodeSelector.description: key value labels for nodes constraint

labels.description: attach key value metadata to algorithm pod, usually for users

annotations.description: attach key value metadata to algorithm pod, usually for tools and libraries

downloadFileExt.description: the extension name that will be attached to a file when downloading algorithm result

items.description: Fill one of the volume types (emptyDir, PVC, CM, Secret)

sideCars.description: a list of sideCars for the algorithm

container.description: key-value pairs of names and images for containers

volumeMounts.description: key-value pairs of names and mountPaths

environments.description: key value environment variables for sideCar

name.description: Unique identifier representing a specific algorithm

algorithmImage.description: image name as in the docker registry

applyCpuLimits.description: whether to apply cpu limits to the algorithm

workerCustomResources.description: Custom resource limits and requests for the algorithm worker - overrides defaults for THIS algorithm.

reservedMemory.description: Reserved memory for HKube's operations such as in-memory cache, higher value means faster data retrieval and less algorithm memory, lower value means slower data retrieval and more algorithm memory

devMode.description: runs algorithm with mounted sources to allow rapid development cycles

opengl.description: should algorithm support XGL context creation (mount X socket)

mounts.description: a list of volumes to mount into the algorithm

pvcName.description: name of an existing kubernetes pvc (persistent volume claim)

path.description: the mount path in the algorithm container

volumeType.description: Special volume types such as emptyDir

url.description: a url for the git repository

branchName.description: the branch name you wish to create a build from

tag.description: a specific tag which will trigger the build

token.description: a token which allows hkube's build system to access private repositories more information https://help.github.com/en/articles/creating-a-personal-access-token-for-the-command-line

dependencyInstallCmd.description:
Command to run to install algorithm dependencies. CWD is the algorithm root folder
Defaults to language specific defaults.
e.g. For python: pip install -r requirements.txt

baseImage.description: Custom docker image to be used as base to the newly built algorithm image

minHotWorkers.description: how many live algorithm instances will always run

maxWorkers.description: Maximum number of workers for this algorithm. 0 marks no limit

quotaGuarantee.description: The amount of algorithms required to be scheduled first in a case of cluster pressure

algorithmEnv.description: key value environment variables for algorithm

workerEnv.description: key value environment variables for worker

queue.description: Name of the KAI queue to assign the algorithm to

nodeSelector.description: key value labels for nodes constraint

labels.description: attach key value metadata to algorithm pod, usually for users

annotations.description: attach key value metadata to algorithm pod, usually for tools and libraries

downloadFileExt.description: the extension name that will be attached to a file when downloading algorithm result

items.description: Fill one of the volume types (emptyDir, PVC, CM, Secret)

sideCars.description: a list of sideCars for the algorithm

container.description: key-value pairs of names and images for containers

volumeMounts.description: key-value pairs of names and mountPaths

environments.description: key value environment variables for sideCar

items.description: A storage prefix or name.

encoding.description: The encoding format for the storage.

moduleName.description: The module name responsible for the storage.

path.description: The storage path of the directory or collection being queried (e.g., `cicd-hkube-builds`).

total.description: The total number of items (builds) available in the specified path.

path.description: The full path of the build.

size.description: The size of the build (in bytes).

mtime.description: The last modification timestamp of the build, formatted as ISO 8601.

items.description: A name representing a specific storage or service.
